citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:18 PM on 27-
January-2022. Inspectors arrived at the facility attempted to contact the facility representative by phone. The
representative stated that no one was available for an inspection and would not be available within a reasonable time
frame.
Additional Inspectors:
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:18 PM on 27-
January-2022. Inspectors arrived at the facility attempted to contact the facility representative by phone. The 
representative stated that no one was available for an inspection and would not be available within a reasonable time 
frame. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
